citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at @11:20am &
@1:05pm on 21-NOV-16.
Contacted licensee by cell initially at 11:20am, text message at 1:05pm licensee replied unable to return to facility
within 30-45 minutes for inspection.
